sentences.en: ...a wealthy businessman who owns a printing business in Orlando.
sentences.cn: …一个在奥兰多拥有印刷企业的富有商人。

sentences.en: A businessman who refused to pay protection money was shot nine times.
sentences.cn: 一位拒交保护费的商人被打了9枪。

sentences.en: A businessman will grasp at any chance to make a profit.
sentences.cn: 一个商人会抓住任何一个机会赚钱。

sentences.en: A City businessman swindled investors out of millions of pounds.
sentences.cn: 一名来自伦敦商业区的商人骗取了投资者们数百万英镑。

sentences.en: A wealthy businessman has been found bludgeoned to death.
sentences.cn: 一位富商被发现死于重物连续猛击。

sentences.en: Finzer is not just any East Coast businessman.
sentences.cn: 芬泽不是个普通的东海岸生意人。

sentences.en: He built up a reputation as a tough businessman.
sentences.cn: 他树立了铁面生意人的名声。

sentences.en: He claimed that the businessman had conned him of £10,000.
sentences.cn: 他声称那个商人骗了他1万英镑。

sentences.en: He is a businessman ... and that is what we need right now. Someone who can create jobs for our kids.
sentences.cn: 他是个商人，也就是我们现在最需要的人，他是一个可以为我们的孩子创造就业机会的人。

sentences.en: He is the embodiment of the young successful businessman.
sentences.cn: 他是成功青年企业家的典型。

sentences.en: He looks every inch the City businessman.
sentences.cn: 他完全是一副伦敦金融城商界人士的派头。

sentences.en: He was a sound businessman, totally reliable and incorruptible.
sentences.cn: 他是个正直的商人，完全可靠，不会被收买。

sentences.en: His parents are so rich that he can just play at being a businessman.
sentences.cn: 他父母有的是钱，以致他可以敷衍了事地作个商人。

sentences.en: I want to empower the businessman.
If nothing else, Doug is a hard-nosed businessman.
sentences.cn: 别的不说，道格起码是个精明务实的商人。

sentences.en: In 1988, he changed jobs and became a businessman.
sentences.cn: 1988年, 他换了工作,下海做了一名商人.

sentences.en: The money was donated by a local businessman who wishes to remain anonymous .
sentences.cn: 这笔款子是当地一位不愿透露姓名的企业家捐赠的。

sentences.en: The prospect of easy profits has attracted the wrong kind of businessman.
sentences.cn: 轻松捞取利润的可能性吸引了一拨不良商人。

sentences.en: William joined forces with businessman Nicholas Court to launch the new vehicle.
sentences.cn: 威廉和企业家尼古拉斯·考特联手推出这款新车。

trans.tran_en: a man who works in business
a man who works in business
